title: Chicken and Mushrooms in a White Wine Sauce
ingredients: ['60g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '60g butter', '225g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1/2 small onion, chopped', '250ml chicken stock', '125ml white wine', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, for garnish']
